title: FSI for rehabilitation of eligible slum/pavement dwellers includes the FSI for the rehab component and for the free sale component
clause_text: FSI for rehabilitation of eligible slum/pavement dwellers includes the FSI for the rehab component and for the free sale component. The ratio between the two components shall be as laid down herein below.
